name: greeting
description: Greeting responses for when a user initiates conversation
responses: Hello! Welcome to Delane Nails. How can I assist you today?
Hi there! I'm NailAide, your virtual assistant for Delane Nails. How may I help you?
Welcome to Delane Nails! I'm here to help with appointments, services, or any questions you might have.
Hello! Looking for gorgeous nails? You've come to the right place. How can I help you today?
